Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Herbal \Herb"al\, a. Of or pertaining to herbs. --Quarles. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Herbal \Herb"al\, n. 1. A book containing the names and descriptions of plants. --Bacon. [1913 Webster]
2. A collection of specimens of plants, dried and preserved; a hortus siccus; an herbarium. --Steele. [1913 Webster]
herbal adj : of or relating to herbs; "herbal tea, herbal medicine"
